ValidationRule.description: under the Paychex Utility account there is a contact named Handbook Declined. We want to prevent user from creating their own Handbook Declined contact. case #26083597
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: OR((FirstName = 'Handbook' && LastName = 'Declined'), (FirstName = 'Declined' && LastName = 'Handbook')) && Account.Name != 'Paychex Utility' && NOT(BEGINS($Profile.Name, "System Admin"))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: There is already a contact named Handbook Declined under the Paychex Utility account. Please use that one.
